Trash game with bullshit hitboxes and bullshit "balancing", not only gameplay-wise. 
Regularly being matched with purple & green ranks as a red rank. No fun for noone, just because the matchmaking system is on drugs. Few patches before you as a surv could see the ranks of other survivors - this got  removed;  matchmaking took probably too long when other ppl could see pre-match with whom they are being matched with and left constantly. 

They could've fixed the matchmaking but of course they took the easy way out and removed said "feature", so one can hardly complain legitimately about the matchmaking since there is hardly anything publicly accessible like stats etc. 

BUT no worries, supposedly a complex MMR system works in the background a HIDDEN one, like seriously why would anyone want to know their MMR... fuck off 

not to talk about all the braindead, toxic players, mostly survivor's
worst part is it's fucking addictive   

So yeah, have had enough of CS&GO / LoL / DoTA whatever ? Not enough of all the toxic ppl? wanna play something new just so you have a different reason to end your life after having seen this misery? 
This is the game for you

Dead By Daylight has a lot of potential but i have noticed one thing in the 5 hours i've played so far and that is the fact that the DbD community is far more toxic than the league of legends community and that is saying something. You can play the game with friends in custom games and it's loads of fun, but if you're looking for a good experience playing solo, you won't find it here.

So far every match i have been in, the toxicity has been absolutely ridiculous, to the point where if i hadn't already played 2 hours of it i would have already gotten a refund for it and never looked back. Would i recommend this game for friends to play together? Yes. Would i recommend it for anyone just wanted to solo? Hell no, spend your $20 elsewhere.

Если вам нравится жрать ссанину и окунаться в жидкий понос, эта игра точно для вас, вы получите незабываемые ощущения, когда вам в пи3дак прилетает топор е6учей зайчихи,
когда вы уже обронили вашу телку(доску) и ушли за километров 30 от нее, вам все равно прилетает эта xYета, спросите почему так? да 6лять я не знаю, я не е6у, идите лучше поиграйте не в эту 3алупу, и не задавайте таких вопросов, или может вы попали в ситуацию, у вас лузстрик, вы уже хотите повесится не то что в жизни на табуретке, а 6лять просто сами себя повесить на крюк, чтобы эта хYила вас не поймала, поняли про кого я? ПРАВИЛЬНО это свинота с пилой и инсидиусом, что может быть лучше и интереснее? конечно, когда вы чините генератор, не то что рядом с подвалом, а прямо в нем, а куда вы сбежите, правильно, на крюк максимум, оно вас кладет и несет туда на скорости, когда магазин закрывается в 22:00, но батя хочет пива, и хYячит вас с пинка за ним в 21:55, так он также несется и вешает вас на самый дальний крюк и стоит, похрякивает своей измазанной пи3донией говном и кивает, нормальный ГЕЙмплей, если вам не жалко потратить 500 рублей на сие ТВАРЬение pretty good job so far, то просто идите впи3ду

A very unique game, that requires skill and patience, but is so rewarding when you win. 
Since it is only multiplayer, you have to learn as you go, but that's not so bad. Honestly, its part of the experience and when you do understand the strategies needed to win you'll be able to experience some really close calls and crazy moments of teamwork, skill, and dumb luck.

I've been playing for years and the game has grown on me, there just aren't that many games out there that will get your blood pumping like this one.
Good break from FPS games. This can improve your game sense, I just haven't played enough yet.

Quer uma dica valiosa? O jogo não está em seu estado perfeito o suficiente pra te dar prazer em jogar depois de 1k horas, no início você vai gostar e se divertir bastante com o jogo, mas depois o jogo fica repetitivo e extremamente fácil de te deixar irritado e pra baixo. 
O jogo é muito "clichê", ele quase nunca tem nada de novo além do que ele proporciona, ele sempre vai trazer atualizações repetitivas:
-Dlc nova com killer, surv(as vezes 2), e de vez em quando um mapa novo
-Skins, que no final são coisas bem inúteis e pouco relevantes
-eventos reciclados que de vez em quando tem algo de novo
-e balanceamento que nunca deixa certo as coisas(o jogo praticamente tem as perks imutáveis que nunca saem do meta)
Eu amava esse jogo no início, realmente era algo que eu nunca tinha visto, mas agora ele ficou repetitivo
Aviso final: você vai ver bastante gente com mais de 5k horas nesse jogo, mas na maioria das vezes são pessoas que produzem conteúdo e ganham dinheiro com isso e o divertimento delas é que o jogo é desbalanceado a ponto de que elas sempre caem com pessoas de menos horas, ou seja, partida ganha :)
è un gioco grandioso che dispone di prendere posto di un sopravvissuto e un killer
